attributes.action: Ensure there is an adequately funded youth council/forum in every ward in the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a country, we complain about young people "hanging around" when in fact there is very often little for them to do in their local areas. Rather than just arresting them or assuming that adults know what young people want, let's actually ask them!!

Youth forums or councils are pretty cheap to run and begin to break down barriers within communities. All it involves are a few adults in charge of parts of a community, lots of young people, a comfy venue and loads of pizza.
